treebank.comment:
The present XML file has been created by Giuseppe G. A. Celano, 23 February 2015, at Leipzig University.
The following text comes from Aesopi Fabulae by Aemilius Chambry, Les Belles Lettres, 1925, pars prior (= 1st volume).
The scanned book is available here: http://digital.slub-dresden.de/werkansicht/dlf/106495/7/0/
I have copied and pasted the text from this website ( http://mythfolklore.net/aesopica/chambry/1.htm ), checked it against the original scanned volume, and converted it into the treebank format.
The text has been automatically checked for Unicode codepoints, so that it only contains the correct letters from the Unicode Chart Greek Extended and Unicode Chart Greek and Coptic (for example, no mathematical Greek letters).
I have automatically checked punctuation: all colons (U+003A) have been converted into middle dots (U+00B7) and all apostrophes (U+0027) into modifier letter apostrophes (U+02BC).
The @subdoc contains reference to the number of fable according to Chambry's aforementioned edition.
